description:
本题选用的是历年研究生招生考试英语（二）大作文的常见题型——图表作文。这类题型要求考生对图表中呈现的内容进行整体描述，并对图表中所反映出来的社会时代现象给出合理、清晰和透彻的逻辑分析以及说明。阅卷评分时，重点针对文章内容是否包含图表中所有要点、论述是否条理、层次是否清晰、能否准确运用语法结构、词汇运用是否灵活多样、能否熟练运用体现文章整体逻辑的衔接手段等要点进行给分。

本题采用了饼状图，内容是某高校学生旅游目的调查。从图中可以看到，高校学生旅游目的大多是欣赏风景（所占比例37%）和缓解压力（占比33%）。学生旅游是考生非常熟悉的话题。考生在描述图表内容以后，应依据自己的理解和判断就学生旅游目的进行评述。

另外，考生也应注意，观点积极，中心突出，衔接紧密，合乎逻辑，避免单调地堆砌、罗列事实或数字。

46.We don’t have to learn how to be mentally healthy, it is built into us in the same way that our bodies know how to heal a cut or mend a broken bone.
就像我们的身体知道怎样让伤口修复或者让伤骨痊愈一样，我们并不需要去学会如何保持健康的心理。

47 Our mental health doesn’t really go anywhere; like the sun behind a cloud, it can be temporarily hidden from view, but it is fully capable of being restored in an instant.

我们的心理健康并没有离开；就像太阳被云彩遮住，虽然暂时看不到太阳，但是它完全有能力转瞬出现。

48Mental health allows us to view others with sympathy if they are having troubles, with kindness if they are in pain, and with unconditional love no matter who they are.

心理健康让我们看到他人遭遇烦扰时不吝同情，看到他人忍受疼痛时胸怀悲慈，无论对谁都心存大爱。

49 Although mental health is the cure-all for living our lives, it is perfectly ordinary as you will see that it has been there to direct you through all your difficult decisions.

尽管心理健康是我们存活于世的灵丹妙药，但它在我们的生活中稀松平常，它指引着我们度过人生所有的艰难抉择。

50 As you will come to see, knowing that mental health is always available and knowing to trust it allow us to slow down to the moment and live life happily.

你将会发现——健康的心理会常伴左右。要赋予其信任。这些理解会让我们缓下脚步，活在当下，拥抱幸福。

 
小作文
Suppose you are a librarian in your university. Write a notice of about 100 words, providing the newly-enrolled international students with relevant information about the library.
You should write neatly on the ANSWER SHEET.
Do not sign your name at the end of the notice. Use “Li Ming” instead.
Do not write the address. (10 points)
 
Notice
For the newly-enrolled international students, please come and get your library cards at the registration office of the Central Library. We have computers available in the lobby for checking up on any book or document you may need. Literature and arts books are on the second floor. Science and engineering books are on the third floor. Tapes, CDs and other audiovisual documents are on the fourth floor. You can check the latest journals in the West Hall. The back issues can be found in the East Hall. We have photocopy service as well if you need to copy or scan documents. Please feel free to contact us if you need help with library using via library@xxxuniversity.edu.cn.
 
Central Library
Li Ming
 
大作文
2016考研英语（一） 写作范文
52. Directions:
Write an essay of 160-200 words on the following picture. In your essay, you should 
1) describe the picture briefly,
2) interpret its intended meaning, and
3) give your comments.
    You should write neatly on the ANSWER SHEET. (20 points)
 
This picture, which illustrates the significance of the good example as parents, consists of two drawings. The first drawing shows that a father is watching TV with a cigarette in his hand. The second drawing, in contrast, shows that a father and his son are both doing their paperwork attentively. The father is commanding his son to focus on study in the first drawing while the other father is setting a good example to his son in the second.
What is intended to show in the picture is clear: Parents should be a model for their children in every aspect of life, for they are the closest people to their children and children are born to love, respect and admire them. Undoubtedly, parents have the most influential impact on their children.
Impacted by various kinds of temptations in life, we can easily encounter a scene when parents do whatever they like regardless of the negative influence on their children. Yet, what a child grows up to be is determined not so much by what he is commanded to do as what he sees his parents do. Be a good example to your children and you would not regret it.
